summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3769 for the improvement of the alley in block 32, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Allison Street and Millard Street, from Harvard Avenue North to Fuhrman Avenue, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46453, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
